oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Waylon Payne - 2018-08-18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Waylon Payne from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on August 18, 2018. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Waylon Payne;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (01:25) Opening comments and introduction by Abi Tapia / (05:08) Opening comments from Waylon / (05:12) Performs She's Gone / (10:11) Performs Running From The Rain / (13:09) Waylon greets the audience and introduces the next song / (13:51) Performs Help Me Make It Through The Night / (16:18) Performs Mama Drive On / (20:55) Introduces the next song / (21:42) Performs Unidentified song likely titled After The Storm / (25:34) Answers question from the audience about the songwriting process and writing for himself or for someone else and talks about his drug problems / (29:20) Introduces the next song / (30:36) Performs Solitary Thinking / (33:57) Answers question about writing words or music first and tells story about hearing Shelby Lynne sing for the first time / (37:00) Performs Unidentified song likely titled Let's Steal Another Night For The Lovers / (40:20) Answers question about his guitar and how he acquired it / (43:50) Performs The Bottom segueing into / (41:50) Performs Christian / (50:05) Final comments / (50:24) Walk-out music / (51:11) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Payne, Waylon; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
